This is mobile template
-----------------------

This template is to create your game, consider changing the arts, audio, and increase programming

Tags:
Tap casual game mobile.

GamePlay
--------
Touch the screen (TAP), to fly the bullet move up. 

Demo web:  Bullet Fly

Demo google play: Google play

For each character to be sold in the la_store layout, an item must be created in the array: ArrayCharacter
Please open file "Instruction array store.png" to see the structure.

Para cada personagem a ser vendido no layout la_store, deve ser criado um item no array: ArrayCharacter
Por favor abra o arquivo "Instruction array store.png" para ver a estrutura.

To contact open file "Learn more.txt"
